loadscreen.donations:
Good news! BAR is accepting donations again!
beyondallreason.info/donate
loadscreen.alwaysExpand:
Expanding territory is essential for gaining economic advantage.
Try to secure as many metal spots and geothermal vents as you can.
loadscreen.armyDiversity: Think ahead and include anti-air and support units in your army.
loadscreen.assistFactories:
It is efficient to support a factory with constructors, increasing its build-power.
Select constructors and right-click on the factory to Guard it.
loadscreen.autogroups: Use ALT+(0-9) to assign selected unit type(s) to autogroups. Newly built units of the same type(s) will get automatically added to their autogroup. ALT+Backquote (`) removes units.
loadscreen.buildingHotkeys:
Mastering hotkeys is the key to proficiency.
Use Z,X,C,V to select structure categories and the most frequently built structures.
loadscreen.completelyDisappear: Combine Cloak with radar jamming to completely hide your units.
loadscreen.destroyFighters: Build long range anti-air on an extended front line to slowly dismantle the enemy's fighter-wall.
loadscreen.dGun:
Commanders have a manual D-Gun weapon, which disintegrates every unit with one shot.
Press D to quickly initiate aiming.
loadscreen.dGunAssassin:
Your Commander's D-Gun can be used to insta-kill T3 units.
Don't forget to Cloak (K) first.
loadscreen.disableAntiNukes: You can disable enemy anti-nukes using EMP missiles, available to Armada at T2.
loadscreen.factoryCannibalism: T2 factories are expensive. You can reclaim your T1 factory for metal to fund it.
loadscreen.factoryRepeat: Set your factories on Repeat to have them build a continuous queue of units.
loadscreen.graphicsSettings:
Tweak graphics preferences in the settings menu.
When your performance drops, switch to a lower graphics preset.
loadscreen.groups:
You can assign units to groups by pressing CTRL+(0-9).
Select the group by pressing the group number (0-9).
loadscreen.howShieldsWork: Shields are "plasma deflector shields." They only deflect plasma shells, everything else will go through.
loadscreen.idleConstructors:
Keep all your builders busy.
Press CTRL+Tab to cycle through your idle constructors.
loadscreen.insertFactoryQuickBuild: If you need a unit fast, without disrupting a factory build queue, press ALT and left-click on the unit you need.
loadscreen.joinDiscord: If you encounter a bug, or have a great idea, or want to contribute in any way, please join BAR on Discord.
loadscreen.lastCommander: Always check the Commander-counter located next to the resource bars. If you have the last Commander, you better hide it quick!
loadscreen.lastNotification: Press F5 to go to the location of the last notification or label by a teammate.
loadscreen.longRangeUnits: Most long-ranged units are very vulnerable in close combat. Use the Fight (F) command to always keep a good distance from your targets.
loadscreen.mapmarks: Use ~ + middle mouse button to ping, or ~ + double click to write a label on the map. ~ + click and drag to draw lines on the map
loadscreen.mohoGeoExplosion: Don't build too much around your T2 Geothermal Powerplants, when they die everything will go boom!
loadscreen.nanoTurretFight: Give your Construction Turrets a Fight command (F) to let them repair and reclaim everything within reach.
loadscreen.overflowingEnergy: When you're overflowing energy... build Energy Converters to convert energy into metal.
loadscreen.queues: Queue up multiple consecutive unit actions by holding SHIFT.
loadscreen.reclaimWrecks: Think in advance about reclaiming metal from wrecks piling up at the front.
loadscreen.resurrectFight:
Use the Fight command (F) with your resurrection bots to make them reclaim and repair everything in the vicinity.
Optionally turn on Repeat to let them do this forever.
loadscreen.screenBombers:
When performing a bombing run, fly your fighters first to eliminate the enemy's fighter-wall.
Use the Fight or Patrol commands for more effective engagement.
loadscreen.selectCommander: Press Tab to quickly select and center the camera on your Commander
loadscreen.selectSameType: Select all units of the same type by pressing Q
loadscreen.separateBuildings:
Spread out buildings to prevent chain explosions.
Press ALT+Z and ALT+X to adjust auto-spacing.
loadscreen.separateBuildings2: Remember to separate your highly explosive buildings (like Energy Converters) from the rest of your base.
loadscreen.shareResources:
To share resources with teammates:
Click-and-drag the metal/energy bars next to the player's name.
loadscreen.shareUnits:
To share units with teammates:
Select the unit(s) and click the two-arrows icon next to the player's name.
loadscreen.showMetalSpots:
Have trouble finding metal spots and geothermal vents?
Press F4 to switch to the resource view.
loadscreen.takeUnits: Did your teammate drop out of the game? Type /take to add all of their units to your army.
loadscreen.transportBuildings: Construction Turrets can be picked up by transporters. This way, you can move them where you need more buildpower.
loadscreen.useAntiAir: Air strikes and air drops may come at any time, always have at least one anti-air unit in your base.
loadscreen.useCloak: Cloaking your Commander while stationary drains 100 energy/second. It costs 1000 energy/second when walking.
loadscreen.useDragMove:
It is effective to move your units in spread out formations.
Click-and-drag your mouse while initiating a Move order to draw multiple waypoints.
loadscreen.useFighters: The best way to prevent air strikes is building fighters and putting them on Patrol in front of your base.
loadscreen.useJuno: Enemy mines, radars, and jammers may be disabled using the Juno - built by both factions with T1 constructors.
loadscreen.useMines: Mines are super cheap and quick to build. Remember to build them away from the enemy's line of sight.
loadscreen.usePause: You can pause the game with the PAUSE/BREAK key, or by typing /pause.
loadscreen.useRadar: Radars are cheap. Make them early in the game to effectively warn of initial strikes.
loadscreen.useRadarJammers: Use radar jammers to hide your units from enemy radar and hinder artillery strikes.
loadscreen.useReclaim: Press E and drag a circle to quickly Reclaim all resources and wreckages inside this area.
loadscreen.useRepair: Press R and drag a circle to quickly Repair all units inside this area.
loadscreen.useSelfDestruct: If you are certain of losing a unit in enemy territory, Self-Destruct (CTRL+B) it to prevent leaving a valuable wreck.
loadscreen.useSpotters:
Long-ranged units need scouting for accurate aiming.
Generate a constant stream of fast, cheap units for better vision.
loadscreen.vehiclesOrBots: Vehicles are a good choice for flat and open battlefields. Bots are better on hills.
loadscreen.windEnergyBuffer: If your economy is based on wind generators, always build an Energy Storage to have a reserve for when the wind speed drops.
loadscreen.windSpeed: Go for Wind Generators when the average wind speed is over 7. Current, minimum, and maximum wind speeds are shown to the right of the energy bar.
loadscreen.reportUsers: We have moderators. If someone is breaking the code of conduct, you can report them by right-clicking their name and selecting: Report user.
loadscreen.ignoreUsers: Don't want to hear from someone? You can right-click their name in the lobby to ignore them, in a battle you can Control+Left-click their name to ignore them there.

notifications.comHeavyDamage: Your commander is receiving heavy damage
notifications.teamDownLastCommander: Warning: Your team is down to its last commander.
notifications.youHaveLastCommander: Warning: You have the last commander.
notifications.playerAdded: A player has been added to the game
notifications.raptorsAndScavsMixed: WARNING! You have loaded Raptors and Scavengers at the same time. These two gamemodes are incompatible with each other. Please leave the match and select only one of these AIs. Thank you for your understanding.
notifications.maxUnitsReached: You've reached the max unit cap
notifications.wholeTeamWastingMetal: The whole team is wasting metal
notifications.wholeTeamWastingEnergy: Your whole team is wasting energy
notifications.windNotGood: On this map, wind is not good for energy production
notifications.lrpcTargetUnits: Enemy Long Range Plasma Cannon(s) (LRPC) are targeting your units
notifications.stealthyUnitsDetected: Stealthy units detected within the Intrusion Countermeasure range
notifications.welcome: Welcome to BAR, it is your mission to win this battle with both strategic and tactical supremacy. First, you need to produce metal and energy.
notifications.buildMetal: Choose the metal extractor and build it on a metal spot, indicated by the rotating circles on the map.
notifications.buildEnergy: You will need to produce energy to efficiently construct units. Build windmills or solar panels.
notifications.buildFactory: Well done!  Now you have metal and energy income. It's time to produce mobile units. Choose and build your factory of choice.
notifications.factoryAir: You can now produce aircraft. They are specifically a good support class and give great speed, radar and line of sight.
notifications.factorySeaplanes: You can now produce seaplanes. These are slightly stronger than t1 aircraft and are able to land underwater.
notifications.factoryBots: You can produce mobile bot units now. Bots are fast and light and can climb steeper hills than vehicles. They are cheaper than vehicles, but are also weaker.
notifications.factoryHovercraft: You can now make hovercraft. They are good for ambushing, but their armor will not endure in heavy battle.
notifications.factoryVehicles: You can produce vehicles and tanks. Vehicles are well armored and have heavier weapons. They are slower and more expensive and cannot traverse steep pathways.
notifications.factoryShips: You can now produce ships. The heaviest unit class with the most armor and weapon range. Be aware of submarines and torpedo aircraft that make ship graveyards.
notifications.readyForTech2: Your economy is now strong enough to build a Tech 2 Factory and units. Or you can maximize t1 unit production and try to win in numbers.
notifications.duplicateFactory: It is more efficient to assist the existing factory than to make multiple factories of the same kind.
notifications.paralyzer: You are being attacked by paralyzer units. Units that have been paralyzed cannot function and wont be able to shoot or move until they have been restored.

team.gone: %{playerList} has gone to a better place
